body.content: A user could create a new character via item panel, and control the character by clicking `Control Character` button in the character sheet
As a player, player could also create a new character via `Create item/Character` button in the user panel

items.title: Control or clear control the character

body.content: Open the character sheet, a player could click the `Control Character` button the control or clear control the character
Or clicks the user icon on the user panel

items.title: Share the character sheet in different rooms

body.content: First of all, click `Save to storage` button in the character sheet, the character will be exported to the storage
Second, pull the character from the storage tab in the item panel
Besides, users could also view the characters in the admin page
Click `Setting` button in the character sheet, and then click the edit button in the `Primary Skills` part
Users could adjust the channel height by dragging the channel top edge
From the control panel, users could stitch the sending message shortcut between Enter or Enter+Ctrl
For the people who require multiple channels in each session, system
GM is able to delete the message from the channel

items.title: Switch the main channel(chapter the log)

body.content: PBP session might face the enormous issue. To resolve the problem, GM is able to create a new channel in the channel panel, and switch the main channel via setting panel
Users are able to roll the dice on the dice panel
Or roll the dice directly on the character sheet by clicking the skill
or send the command in the channel(/r 1D100 <= 50 @ Listening)

items.title: Point the position on the map

body.content: By pressing mouse left click in the target position for few seconds, system will highlight the position to all users in the rooms
In addition, GM is able to move everyone's viewing by shift + left click
Users could move the checkerboard by dragging it or press WSAD key in the keyboard
Users could create a new token by dragging the item into the checkerboard
Or drag the image from the user list

There are 5 status about maps in the checkerboard: Display, Fog, Black screen, Perspective and Hidden. 

| Display | Fog | Black screen | Perspective | Hidden |
| ------ | ------ | ------ | ------ | ------ |
| GM and players are able to see the map and the tokens  | players could only see the map without tokens | The map will be showing black screen at begin, while GM could reveal the map partially from editor | review the map 1 by default, while GM could reveal the map 2 partially from the editor | map won't be showing to the players |
GM is able to enter the room as player by clicking the player button in the setting panel, system will open a new page and enter as player `Guest`
可以利用排版來調整整體地圖

一個地圖區塊最多可以放兩張圖, 分為表地圖以及裏地圖. GM可以自由切換自己和玩家現在看到的是表地圖以及裏地圖. 表裏地圖可以有以下功用
 - 時間場景的推移: 可能兩張圖一張上午一張下午, 時間經過時可以接換場景. 
 - GM限定地圖: 像上面這張GM專用地圖有標示細節, 而玩家則沒有. 
 - 表裏地圖透視: 詳見表裏地圖透視說明
裏地圖可以在地圖上傳區選擇第二張地圖上傳

要設定戰爭迷霧, 顯示方式必須為黑幕. 打開編輯器之後即可開始編輯調整.

**註**:在編輯器打開之後, 棋盤是無法使用滑鼠拖動的, 但是可以利用鍵盤WSAD來移動
像陷阱特效這樣的東西, GM甚至可以部份顯示. 只秀給玩家可以看到部分, 像上面地圖裏地圖全部房屋都著火了, 但GM只秀出兩間著火的房屋給玩家看(顯示方式需改成"表裡地圖透視")

1. GM is able to import all players characters by clicking the gear button in turn order panel 
2. GM could rearrange the characters turn order by clicking ">" or "<" buttons 
3. GM could increase/decrease the turn number by clicking ">>" or "<<" buttons.
4. GM could update the turn order value in each character.
